text.title: Decide on a Pet
text.head: Decide on a Pet
text.p: When deciding on a pet , you need to make the right choice , and several factors come into play when choosing . In this article , you 'll learn how to make a good choice for a pet based on your lifestyle and personality . So what are you waiting for ? Happy reading !
text.head: Steps
Evaluating Lifestlye

list.item:
Pick a pet that you have enough time to care for . For a busier lifestlye , you might want a neat pet that does n't require that much care , which could range from anything from a gerbil to a cat ( this range will be narrowed down later . ) For a lifestyle where you are n't away from home often and have plenty of free time , you might want a dog that you can spend plenty of time with . When evaluating how much time you can dedicate to a pet , think of these factors :
Do I travel often ?
Do I want to spend the money it takes on vaccinations and checkups , is it worth it to me ?
Will I be able to give my pet the time it needs ?

Think about how much this pet will cost . A parakeet , for example , requires a cage , toys , treats , and plenty of food and clean water . You 'll need to do some research and see how much it would cost you , based on the pet you were thinking of . You 'll also need to think about whether or not your pet would need checkups or feather clippings . Think about your money and your needs , and from there see how much financial wiggle room you have .

text.head: Meeting Possible Pets

list.item:
Find a pet you know you 'll really care about . Go to a pet store and talk to one of the employees about which pets you 're considering , and they can give you lots of helpful information . Mention some of the pets you were thinking of . If you were , for example , considering getting some koi , ask about the care they require . If you were considering getting a ferret , ask to hold one and ask about the care one would need . Find a pet that speaks to you .
If you want to get a dog , you might want to try going to your local animal shelter . The dogs here all deserve good , loving homes , and shelter dogs I 've had in the past have turned out to be the sweetest animals I 've ever known . These dogs deserve kindness and love , and will be extremely loyal to you .

Buy the proper supplies . You may need to consult an employee about this to ensure you are being thorough . Then pick out which cat/bird/gerbil/rat/mouse/guinea pig/fish/whatever you want you liked the best .
Look for pretty patterns on the fur or a cute personality before deciding which one you want .

text.head: Tips

list.item: The more you spend time with your pet , the more comfortable it will be around you and the more trusting it will become .

It takes a lot more steps than this to decide on a bigger pet , such as a horse . If you are planning on getting a big pet , you should talk to local sellers about the care of such a creature and think deeply about your decision . It will cost a lot to effectively care for larger animals .

text.head: Warnings

list.item: It is crucial that you take good care of your pet . You need to note any unusual behavior or signs of pain or illness and talk to a vet right away .
